A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like: Saw The Last Jedi opening night and it didn't disappoint. I don't think it's as good as Empire Strikes Back\, but it's up there-- high up there-- in terms of being one of the best Star Wars movies yet. It's a film that almost can't be reviewed without revealing spoilers\, so apologies for the lack of specifics. See it you must\, enjoy it you will.
